sentences.en: A literal translation of the name Tapies is "walls."
sentences.cn: Tapies这个名字直译过来是“墙”。

sentences.en: He believed in the students being taught on the translation method.
sentences.cn: 他觉得用翻译法教学生比较好.
他在翻译方面有很深的造诣.

sentences.en: I read the book in translation, not in the original Norwegian.
sentences.cn: 这本书我读的是译本, 不是挪威文原著.

sentences.en: I’ve only read ‘Madame Bovary’ in translation (= not in its original language ) .
sentences.cn: 我只读过《包法利夫人》的翻译本。

sentences.en: It's just a very rough translation.
sentences.cn: 这只是一篇非常粗糙的译稿.

sentences.en: Lanny got a French translation of the seven plays.
sentences.cn: 兰尼有这七个戏剧的法文译本.

sentences.en: Much of the book’s humour has been lost in translation (= is no longer effective when translated ) .
sentences.cn: 本书的许多幽默元素已在翻译过程中丢失。

sentences.en: Much of the wit is lost in translation.
sentences.cn: 很多诙谐的成分都在翻译中丢失了。

sentences.en: She helped me with the translation.
She read the letter and gave us a rough translation (= she did not translate everything exactly ) .
sentences.cn: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.en: The editor is giving explanatory notes to the translation.
The translation does not quite correspond to the original.
This is a translation; the original is in French.
sentences.cn: 这是译文, 原文是法文.

sentences.en: Try to catch the elusive charm of the original in translation.
sentences.cn: 翻译时设法把握住原文中难以捉摸的风韵.

sentences.en: When a book goes into translation, all those linguistic subtleties get lost.
sentences.cn: 当一部书被翻译成另一种语言后，所有那些语言上的精妙之处就都丢失了。

sentences.en: You can't really appreciate foreign literature in translation.
sentences.cn: 看翻译作品不能真正欣赏到外国文学原著的美妙之处。

words.tran_cn: 可译的；能译的；可转移的
翻译；转化；解释；转变为；调动

phrases.tran_cn: 机器翻译，计算机翻译；机骗译

trans.tran_en: when you translate something, or something that has been translated
